Package id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.wsp.type

Class ColoredMatrix<T>

java.lang.Object
id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.wsp.type.ColoredMatrix<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the ColoredMatrix elements.
public class ColoredMatrix<T> extends Object
ColoredMatrix holds a generic type matrix and a Color matrix, enabling its elements to be printed with various colors defined in the color matrix.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • colorize

      public void colorize(Point coord, Direction direction, int length, Color color)
      Colorize the matrix at specified starting point, length, direction, and color.
      Parameters:
      coord - elements' starting indices to colorize.
      direction - colorizing direction to colorize multiple elements.
      length - the amount of elements to colorize.
      color - the color to colorize the elements.
